          <title>
            <string language="en">Theseus and the Minotaur -- Creating a Frieze</string>
            <string language="es">Teseo y el minotauro – Creación de un friso</string>
            <string language="ga">Téiséas agus an Míonótár – Fríos a Chruthú</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Theseus und das Minotaur -- Herstellen eines 
Frieses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Theseus et le Minotaur -- créer une frise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Theseus e o Minotaur -- criando um frieze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Theseus ed il Minotaur -- creare un frieze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Theseus και το Minotaur -- που δημιουργεί ένα 
Frieze</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is the telling of the myth with a view to represnting it in a frieze for the classroom wall.</string>
            <string language="es">Este es el relato del mito con vistas a representarlo en un friso para la pared de la clase.</string>
            <string language="ga">Is e seo insint an scéil chun é a léiriu i bhfríos ar fhalla an ranga.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE History</string>
            <string language="es">Historia SESE. Historia. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">OSIE Stair</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Story</string>
            <string language="ga">Scéal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist das Erklären des Mythus angesichts des
Represntings ihn in einem Friese für die Klassenzimmerwand.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est raconter le mythe en vue de represnting le 
dans une frise pour le mur de salle de classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é dizer do mito com uma vista a represnting 
a em um frieze para a parede da sala de aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è dire del mito con vista a represnting in 
un frieze per la parete dell'aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι η αφήγηση του μύθου με σκοπό αυτό σε ένα
frieze για τον τοίχο τάξεων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
